text: Apolo may refer to: * Apolo, La Paz, a town in the La Paz Department in Bolivia * Apolo Anton Ohno, a US-American Olympic gold medal–winning short track speed skater who also won Dancing with the Stars in 2007 * Apolo Kivebulaya, Ugandan Anglican priest and evangelist * Germán Figueroa, also known as Apolo—a Puerto Rican professional wrestler ==See also== * Apollo (disambiguation) * Appolo (disambiguation) * Appollo (disambiguation)
title: Apolo
